content: What is Django and why use it?

Ya so basically Django is a web development, a framework in Python And we use Django for basically like integrating web development technology in our project and in Django we have multiple files like setting PY URLs. And view dot PY also. Basically Django is something by which we can create our website in a easy way and it is called. It is kind of full stack.

Uh, yeah. So basically Django models are something like we can say we can integrate our database with our front end, or like we can say we have model P Wi-Fi in which we write the Python scripts and the. Basically this concept is called ORM like Object relational mapper and by the help of requisite script it automatically generate the table in our database like in back end. Also migration is something if you want to change in our database we have two command for it. Python manager PY make migration and migrate.
What is a Django view? Difference between function-based and class-based views?

Yeah. So basically Django view is something where we write our logic like where when we want to like write logic or we want to do something task or such thing. So we just use our Django view and we can create it by two types like or we can create a class or we can.
How do you handle forms in Django?
Basically in Django we created form dot PY file in which when we want to take input from user we can simply like create. Form vy.
What is Django ORM? Give an example.

Basically Django ORM is something object relational mapper and in this like when we want to don't want to write a SQL script and we want the Python scripts only. So basically in model PY file we automatically like write it and it created database tabled in our back end.

Yeah so you are loading something like when we create our view dot PY file in our application like in Django app and also like we can create other view PY and URL dot PY and if we want to like create something. Or we want to route our view dot. URS dot PY.
How do you use templates in Django?
Basically templates we use for creating our front end. Basically it templates are like our HTML, CS and JavaScript files.
What is a REST API and how would you implement it in Django?

Yeah, so in basically the STP is are Restful state transfer API. Basically it is like when we want to like get some data from the external source and when user request from server and we use API like for data fetching. Data reading data update. So it has multiple like methods like get, post, put and patch also. And in Django we have DRF Django rest framework.
Thank you, your interview is over.
